text.section:
A person may not intentionally mutilate, deface, destroy, burn, trample, or use a flag:
in a manner intended to incite or produce an imminent breach of the peace; and
under circumstances likely to incite or produce an imminent breach of the peace.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
